traits.name: Stalk-still
traits.desc: A myconid that remains perfectly still has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

actions.name: Stone Knuckles
actions.desc: Melee weapon attack: +5 to hit. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spore Bomb
actions.desc: Ranged weapon attack: +3 to hit, range 30/60 ft. Hit: 5 (2d4) poison damage and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The affected creature can attempt the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
